edu.rit.se.coolTeamB.marketing

Class MarketingManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • edu.rit.se.coolTeamB.marketing.MarketingManager

  • public class MarketingManager
extends java.util.Observable
    The MarketingManager Java class provides utility functions which are performed using the marketing user interface - MarketingUI.
    Version:
    1.00 21 Mar 2013
    Author:
    Michael Surdouski (mxs1649@rit.edu)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MarketingManager(java.util.List<LocalVend> localVends)
      MarketingManager handles all marketing access level changing of information in the SVM system.
